channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Iranian students at the University of Alabama say immigration crackdown echoes repression at home
item.description: Alireza Doroudi has been detained in an immigration facility in Louisiana for nearly six weeks. Doroudi’s detention has instilled fear in the small Iranian community in Tuscaloosa, Alabama, where he and his fiancee are doctoral students.

item.title: NYPD shared a Palestinian protester’s info with ICE. Now it’s evidence in her deportation case
In the wake of devastating Los Angeles fires, residents begin to rebuild
